Yeah... The Cutscenes aren't working for me. Got a solution?

Cutscenes use the very OLD indeo v5 codec. Try this.
http://www.moviecodec.com/downloads/31d.html

Game seems to work on windows 7 64bit. even autodetected that i have a gamepad! it's probably an Asian release. Rockman title screen/logo, but English voice/menus/text. interesting...
